title: Urbanization in Canada 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of urban population, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Share of urban population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2017, and finally roughly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Share of urban population, of value 81.41 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Share of urban population, of value 80.58 was reported at Year 2008

In general Share of urban population has stayed the same over the Year.
